name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Treats
author: Vernita Bles
instructions: In a large saucepan or microwave safe bowl, melt butter and marshmallows. Remove from the heat, stir in peanut butter. Gradually add cereal. mix until well-coated. Spread and press into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan, set aside. In a microwave safe bowl or the top of a double boiler over simmering water, melt the chips. Spread over cereal mixture. Cover and freeze for 15 to 20 minutes or until chocolate is set.
